allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Add recruitment dashboard project

- Add main dashboard with KPI metrics
- Include charts for recruitment data visualization  
- Add responsive design with dark/light theme
- Include assets (CSS, JS, Chart.js library)

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
Bash(git commit -m "Move files to root for GitHub Pages")
Bash(sed -i 's/分支招聘转化分析/分支排名数据/g' D:/vscode/databse/index.html)
